Hierarchy

Index

Properties

  • filter
  • name

Properties

Optional filter

filter: object

The device filter

Constructed like so:

 filter: {
   state: { $eq: "bootstrapped" },
   createdAt: { $gte: new Date("01-01-2014"), $lte: new Date("01-01-2018") },
   updatedAt: { $gte: new Date("01-01-2014"), $lte: new Date("01-01-2018") },
   customAttributes: {
     <custom_name_1>: { $eq: "custom_value_1" },
     <custom_name_2>: { $ne: "custom_value_2" }
   }
 }

Type declaration

  • Optional accountId?: ComparisonObject<string>
  • Optional alias?: ComparisonObject<string>
  • Optional bootstrapCertificateExpiration?: ComparisonObject<Date>
  • Optional bootstrappedTimestamp?: ComparisonObject<Date>
  • Optional certificateFingerprint?: ComparisonObject<string>
  • Optional certificateIssuerId?: ComparisonObject<string>
  • Optional connectorCertificateExpiration?: ComparisonObject<Date>
  • Optional createdAt?: ComparisonObject<Date>
  • Optional customAttributes?: object
    • [key: string]: ComparisonObject<string>
  • Optional description?: ComparisonObject<string>
  • Optional deviceClass?: ComparisonObject<string>
  • Optional deviceType?: ComparisonObject<string>
  • Optional firmwareChecksum?: ComparisonObject<string>
  • Optional hostGateway?: ComparisonObject<string>
  • Optional manifestTimestamp?: ComparisonObject<Date>
  • Optional mechanism?: ComparisonObject<string>
  • Optional mechanismUrl?: ComparisonObject<string>
  • Optional name?: ComparisonObject<string>
  • Optional serialNumber?: ComparisonObject<string>
  • Optional state?: ComparisonObject<string>
  • Optional updatedAt?: ComparisonObject<Date>
  • Optional vendorId?: ComparisonObject<string>

Optional name

name: string

The name of the query
